EmailTemplate.name: FS Renewal Response
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
We are pleased to renew your subscription. You may review the invoice directly on the aerospace portal using the steps below:
• Please go to https://aerospace.honeywell.com (login required) • From the GoDirect Services Dashboard, under Billing Management click "Review Renewals" • On Manage My Contracts/Subscriptions page, Review the "Action or Additional Details" column. Click on "Subscription Renewal"
If you have any trouble or need further assistance, please let us know.
{!Case.OwnerFullName}
Honeywell | Aerospace Main: 602.365.7020 option 6 Email: fssaccounts@honeywell.com Visit our web portal: aerospace.honeywell.com
{!EmailMessage.TextBody}
